title: RP and BE in PBE
body: So my PBE is being a little weird. When i first logged into it, I had 999999999 RP and the the second time, it just changed down to 8000, but that's not the case with my other friends who have PBE accounts. So i was just wondering if this is happening with anyone else and/or if this is just a bug or something :/

replies.body: Sorry for the confusion here!  PBE is on a daily stipend now that will refresh around noon pacific time.  You won't see a huge balance anymore, but you'll continue receiving this stipend.  82t  has some spot on info!

When was the first time you logged in? After 10/18 they changed it so your RP gets reset to 8000 every day at 11:00 am PDT. 
Here's the link if you need info: https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/6KrtEEwg-1018-pbe-status-faq

#Is this happening to anyone else?

1. ○ yes
2. ○ No

Well i don't know if this happend to somebodey on the other side of the world..
